intro: Lavatera × clementii, commonly known as the hybrid lavatera, is a flowering plant in the Malvaceae family. It is a shrub or small tree that can grow up to 3 meters tall, featuring broad, ovate leaves with a soft, velvety texture. The plant produces showy, fluffy flowers in shades of white, pink, and purple, which bloom in summer. It is native to Australia and thrives in well-drained soils with full sun exposure. Lavatera × clementii is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ability to attract pollinators.
